root['Relic Effect/s']['4'].new_value: When the wearer is the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of 'Help,' stacking up to 2 time(s). If there are 2 stack(s) of 'Help,' consumes all 'Help' and increases the wearer's ATK by 48% for 1 turn(s).
root['Relic Effect/s']['4'].old_value: When the wearer is the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of 'Help.' Stacks up to 2 times. When using Ultimate, consumes all 'Help,' each stack increasing the wearer's ATK by 48%, lasting until the end of the turn.
